name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.sheafificationWhiskerLeftIso_hom_app
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝⁸ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
D : Type w₁
inst✝⁷ : CategoryTheory.Category.{max v u, w₁} D
E : Type w₂
inst✝⁶ : CategoryTheory.Category.{max v u, w₂} E
inst✝⁵ : ∀ (α β : Type (max v u)) (fst snd : β → α), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape (CategoryTheory.Limits.WalkingMulticospan fst snd) D
inst✝⁴ : ∀ (α β : Type (max v u)) (fst snd : β → α), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape (CategoryTheory.Limits.WalkingMulticospan fst snd) E
inst✝³ : ∀ (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) D
inst✝² : ∀ (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) E
P : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor D E
inst✝¹ : ∀ (F : CategoryTheory.Functor D E) (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) F
inst✝ : ∀ (F : CategoryTheory.Functor D E) (X : C) (W : J.Cover X) (P : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) D), CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesLimit (W.index P).multicospan F
⊢ Eq ((J.sheafificationWhiskerLeftIso P).hom.app F) (J.sheafifyCompIso F P).hom
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sheafificationWhiskerLeftIso_hom_app (P : Cᵒᵖ ⥤ D) (F : D ⥤ E)
    [∀ (F : D ⥤ E) (X : C), PreservesColimitsOfShape (J.Cover X)ᵒᵖ F]
    [∀ (F : D ⥤ E) (X : C) (W : J.Cover X) (P : Cᵒᵖ ⥤ D),
        PreservesLimit (W.index P).multicospan F] :
    (sheafificationWhiskerLeftIso J P).hom.app F = (J.sheafifyCompIso F P).hom := by
  dsimp [sheafificationWhiskerLeftIso, sheafifyCompIso]
  rw [Category.comp_id]

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.whiskerRight_toSheafify_sheafifyCompIso_hom_assoc
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝⁸ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
D : Type w₁
inst✝⁷ : CategoryTheory.Category.{max v u, w₁} D
E : Type w₂
inst✝⁶ : CategoryTheory.Category.{max v u, w₂} E
F : CategoryTheory.Functor D E
inst✝⁵ : ∀ (α β : Type (max v u)) (fst snd : β → α), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape (CategoryTheory.Limits.WalkingMulticospan fst snd) D
inst✝⁴ : ∀ (α β : Type (max v u)) (fst snd : β → α), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape (CategoryTheory.Limits.WalkingMulticospan fst snd) E
inst✝³ : ∀ (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) D
inst✝² : ∀ (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) E
inst✝¹ : ∀ (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) F
inst✝ : ∀ (X : C) (W : J.Cover X) (P : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) D), CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesLimit (W.index P).multicospan F
P : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) D
Z : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) E
h : Quiver.Hom (J.sheafify (P.comp F)) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.whiskerRight (J.toSheafify P) F) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (J.sheafifyCompIso F P).hom h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (J.toSheafify (P.comp F)) h)
decl:
@[simp, reassoc]
theorem whiskerRight_toSheafify_sheafifyCompIso_hom :
    whiskerRight (J.toSheafify _) _ ≫ (J.sheafifyCompIso F P).hom = J.toSheafify _ := by
  dsimp [sheafifyCompIso]
  erw [whiskerRight_comp, Category.assoc]
  slice_lhs 2 3 => rw [plusCompIso_whiskerRight]
  rw [Category.assoc, ← J.plusMap_comp, whiskerRight_toPlus_comp_plusCompIso_hom, ←
    Category.assoc, whiskerRight_toPlus_comp_plusCompIso_hom]
  rfl

@[simp, reassoc]

name: CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology.sheafifyCompIso_inv_eq_sheafifyLift
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝¹² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
J : CategoryTheory.GrothendieckTopology C
D : Type w₁
inst✝¹¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{max v u, w₁} D
E : Type w₂
inst✝¹⁰ : CategoryTheory.Category.{max v u, w₂} E
F : CategoryTheory.Functor D E
inst✝⁹ : ∀ (α β : Type (max v u)) (fst snd : β → α), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape (CategoryTheory.Limits.WalkingMulticospan fst snd) D
inst✝⁸ : ∀ (α β : Type (max v u)) (fst snd : β → α), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape (CategoryTheory.Limits.WalkingMulticospan fst snd) E
inst✝⁷ : ∀ (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) D
inst✝⁶ : ∀ (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) E
inst✝⁵ : ∀ (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) F
inst✝⁴ : ∀ (X : C) (W : J.Cover X) (P : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) D), CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesLimit (W.index P).multicospan F
P : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) D
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.HasForget D
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesLimits (CategoryTheory.forget D)
inst✝¹ : ∀ (X : C), CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesColimitsOfShape (Opposite (J.Cover X)) (CategoryTheory.forget D)
inst✝ : (CategoryTheory.forget D).ReflectsIsomorphisms
⊢ Eq (J.sheafifyCompIso F P).inv (J.sheafifyLift (CategoryTheory.whiskerRight (J.toSheafify P) F) ⋯)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sheafifyCompIso_inv_eq_sheafifyLift :
    (J.sheafifyCompIso F P).inv =
      J.sheafifyLift (whiskerRight (J.toSheafify P) F)
        (HasSheafCompose.isSheaf _ ((J.sheafify_isSheaf _))) := by
  apply J.sheafifyLift_unique
  rw [Iso.comp_inv_eq]
  simp
